summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1738, for the improvement of Russell Avenue, from 17th Avenue Northwest to Market Street, by regarding and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon under Ordinance No. 18438 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
